title: EU Wants a New Deal with Pfizer for Covid Vaccine but the Drug Company Still Wants to be Paid. Even for the Shots It’s Not Making

opengraph.description:
The European Union and Pfizer appear to have a strained relationship. The pharmaceutical giant provided the continent with the Covid vaccine under a contract  which has increasingly drawn scrutiny and garnered suspicion with hints of a possible scandal. Last year, Poland raised issues with the European contract with Pfizer when the Eastern European nation claimed they had a glut of the Covid vaccine and wanted to use a force majeure to get out the contract with the drug company. Pfizer insisted on enforcement of the agreement. However, now it appears the pharmaceutical giant is open to a revision of the contract with the EU. But the question is, are all the European nations on the same page? And as this media reported   the European Commission’s chief negotiated part of the contract with Pfizer’s CEO via a private text!
Company agrees to revision of the contract but still wants to be paid
